title: Hour 2 – Petros Papadakis (07-10-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Petros Papadakis (07-10-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they get into a HEATED debate about Patrick Mahomes’ new contract and if he made a mistake by not getting a fully guaranteed deal. College Football analyst and radio host Petros Papadakis joins the show to talk about the value of a running back in the NFL and what we can expect from college football in 2020. They also question if the MLB adopting a universal DH was a good decision.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
